title: South Africa: the white laager
creator_credit: Barry Callaghan, Sveriges radio aktiebolag, WGBH (Boston), United Nations Television, Villon Films and Peter F. Davis
brief_description: A documentary which explores the history of the Afrikaaners and Afrikaaner nationalism, and the development of apartheid and its relevance to South Africa’s political situation today. Includes interviews with whites in various professions and with differing points of view on apartheid.
